scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run backend:dev && npm run frontend:dev
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && pm2 start app.js --name backend --watch
scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend/react-frontend && pm2 start node_modules/.bin/vite --name frontend --watch
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run backend:prod && npm run frontend:prod
scripts.backend:prod: cd backend && pm2 start app.js --name backend --env production
scripts.frontend:prod: cd frontend/react-frontend && pm2 start node_modules/.bin/vite --name frontend --env production
scripts.restart:dev: npm run stop:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.restart:prod: npm run stop:prod && npm run start:prod
